short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to SkillSync's website, allowing you to scan job descriptions and generate cover letters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download the SkillSync extension today and take the first step towards a smarter, more efficient job hunt. Make your job applications stand out with SkillSync Copilot, your personal Al job assistant.

SkillSync allows you to analyze job listings on LinkedIn, Indeed, and Glassdoor and rate your competency against them based on your SkillSync profile and your resume. SkillSync also allows you to generate, edit, and download cover letters based on your profile, tailored to the job description.

On job application pages, SkillSync helps you autofill information, using information on your SkillSync profile. SkillSync can auto upload resumes, help you answer open-ended application questions using a list of relevant experiences you enter into the app.
